ProductInfo.Features:
Really a wonderful quad-core 3G smartphone with high performance, powerful functions and stylish design
Adopt Android 4.2 OS, and is powered by MTK6589T Cortex-A7 quad-core 1.5GHz CPU, PowerVR SGX544 MP2 GPU and 1GB RAM to ensure its running more stably
Support dual SIM card dual standby, and is fully compatible with worldwide quad-band GSM and WCDMA 3G networks for making phone calls
5.0-inch 1920*1080pixels FHD LTPS screen with full viewing angle and 5-point capacitive touch design will bring you exquisite visual enjoyment
a 5.0MP front camera for self capturing and enjoying online video chat, and a 13.0MP back camera with auto focus for shooting interesting things and moments
ProductInfo.Name: Foxnovo® ZOPO C2 Upgrade MTK6589T Quad-core Android 4.2 5.0-inch FHD LTPS Screen 13MP Camera GPS 1GB/16GB 3G Smartphone (White)
